https://tmrev.io/movie/104336-Body Rice 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6pWj98vs68qXldtrEQYo1wIjNcb.jpg Since 1980 German institutions send teens to the south of Portugal under experimental projects of social rehabilitation. That's how Katrin comes to Alentejo. She will establish a unique relationship with the surrounding environment, a situation exacerbated by the harshness of the landscape and the emptiness of a socially desertified region. Katrin, twith Julia and Pedro, will build a refuge in a no-man's-land... Body Rice
